summary: GAO's protocols dictate how we work with the federal agencies we audit. For instance, agencies should assist us in scheduling an initial meeting (an entrance conference) within 14 calendar days of receiving notice that we are about to begin a new audit. In previous years, the Department of Defense had trouble meeting this deadline. However, we began 42 new audits that involved DOD during the...
title: GAO Audits Involving DOD: Status of Efforts to Schedule and Hold Timely Entrance Conferences
